Dame Harriet Walter says her title is a  PERIOD

The Succession actress was made a Dame Commander of the Order of the British Empire DBE by Queen Elizabeth in  but admitted it causes all kinds of trouble when she tries to fill in forms online PERIOD

Harriet  explained to the Daily Mails Eden Confidential column Sometimes I go OK if I want people to know Im a dame itll say first name and Ill put Dame Harriet PERIOD



Harriet received the title for her services to drama but previously admitted she nearly turned it down PERIOD

She said I thought Im an egalitarian and I dont believe in inequality PERIOD And then I thought You know what All the guys in my profession when they get to a certain age they get offered a knighthood and part of it is because theyve had the access to the roles that will keep them in the profession for decades PERIOD



Along with Succession Harriet has also starred in Call The Midwife The Crown Downton Abbey and Killing Eve PERIOD
